title: Looking to do anything
body: G4 support, looking to play anything, kinda bored {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: yea if you guys want, just send me a friend request and hmu. only really play during the weekends and monday though.
even rank , you can try me out

Hi Karma,

I am building an e-sports club called Rising Power! We have many members in the club who may want to partner with you to climb in ranked. If you are looking to meet new people to chill and play with please check out my club. You can join our discord server https://discord.gg/bAKthcU or visit our website http://www.risingpower.net for more information. Hope to see you in Discord! Best of luck to you this season.
you still willing? wink wink wink?
